metadata.title: CVE-2024-56627 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ksmbd: fix Out-of-Bounds Read in ksmbd_vfs_stream_readAn offset from client could be a negative value, It could leadto an out-of-bounds read from the stream_buf.Note that this issue is coming when setting'vfs objects = streams_xattr parameter' in ksmbd.conf.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
